title: HackGPT Launches as AI-Driven Penetration Testing Suite Using GPT-4 and Other Models

content.raw: HackGPT Enterprise has officially launched as a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed specifically for enterprise security teams. Created by Yashab Alam, Founder and CEO of ZehraSec, the platform represents a significant advancement in automated security assessments by integrating artificial intelligence with traditional penetration testing methodologies. The platform combines OpenAI’s GPT-4 with local language models […] The post HackGPT Launches as AI-Driven Penetration Testing Suite Using GPT-4 and Other Models appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
